attributes.action: Ensure that all Englands borders are clearly signposted and written in large letters "WELCOME TO ENGLAND" and at least one Flag of St George is flown.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Whilst returning from Scotland via the A1 i was welcomed at the England/Scottish border with welcome to Northumberland, no mention of it being England, while on the other side of the road a large sign approx 20 feet high with the scottish flag on and in large letters"welcome to Scotland" plus 3 large Scottish flags flying.on the English side you are just welcomed to the county that youv arrived in on a sign that looks like a signpost to a garden centre.
England isnt dead yet.
